description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8i3tl","text":"This protocol is for T cell differentiation from mice spleen tissue to investigate T cell function (including differentiation and proliferation) in vitro.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"5131r","text":" 1. Pre coating of 96 well plate with antibodies using following reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em1qn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6p3hp","text":" 2. status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Day 0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fr4aq","text":"Prepare precoated 96-well plate using antibodies described in materials section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fo4c5","text":"Prepare single-cell suspensions of mice spleen tissues as per steps below","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lqte","text":"Euthanize mice by CO2 inhalation or other means of euthanasia.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":20,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a3thj","text":"Collect the spleen from the mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ngc6","text":"Add 5mL of RPMI medium to the mashed spleen to collect splenocytes into a 50mL tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5gpbi","text":"Put a 40μm vacuum filter on a 50mL tube. Mesh the spleen on the strainer using the back of a syringe. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"58pri","text":"Spin down cells at 1500rpm for 3min. Discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fks19","text":"Directly add 5mL T cell medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cgq3d","text":"Add 0.5mL ACK lysis buffer to the red cell pellet, resuspend, and wait 30 seconds to lyse RBC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f7o8e","text":"Spin down cells at 1500rpm for 3min. Discard supernatant.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d0at2","text":"Count the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"atuva","text":"Resuspend cells in 10mL T cell medium and filter through a new 40μm vacuum filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"frrc6","text":"Prepare a new 50mL tube with a new 40μm vacuum filter.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Isolation of naïve CD4+ T cells from single-cell suspensions from spleen tissue on Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bvkl7","text":"Naïve CD4+ T cells were isolated from single-cell suspensions from spleen tissue by negative selection using the EasySep Mouse CD4+ T-cell Isolation Kit (#19852, STEMCELL Technologies, Vancouver, Canada).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":9,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":130,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: T cell differentiation on Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e39md","text":"Seed the cells into plate and culture with different conditions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: T cell differentiation on Day 1
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8i85r","text":"Take out the pre-coated plate from 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
